title: League Not Opening
body: This has only started happening about 2 days ago when I try to open league, yet it just outright doesn't open, at least it doesn't open the client it just says that the application isn't responding. I reinstalled the game and the same issue occurs when I closed the client and tried to reopened it later in the day. Anyone know what to do?

replies.body: This can happen if something crashed in the background, or security settings are preventing the patcher from launching.  Give your PC a restart just to be sure!  If the issue continues, the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should fix things up.
Is there a guide to doing this on a Mac?
